Title: CYP3A4 Metabolism
Description: Analysis of metabolic stability, determining the inhibition of CYP3A4 activity and whether the compounds are a substrate for the CYP3A$ enzyme. The data to build these models has been publicly available at PubChem (AID1645840, AID1645841, AID1645842) by ADME@NCATS.
Interpretation: Probability of inhibiting the enzyme and probability of being a ubstrate of the enzyme. Activity in both indicates the compound is a ligand of the enzyme.
